title: Womens Dress

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made with a generous fit that's not tight on the neck, and appreciate its style as a dressier sweatshirt that doesn't look overly baggy. Customers like the color options, particularly the vibrant red, and find it perfect for winter, with one mentioning it keeps them warm without feeling bulky.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable, and a great warm sweater.
items.body: Love this sweater - it is comfortable, top quality, and loose-fitting but not boxy. I will order more colors! Super soft Highly recommended. Read more
items.author: TS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My absolute favorite sweater!
items.body: Update: this year the colors are all off. I bought Chocolate brown but received the Auburn brown. Also, the red is definitely off. It's more of a bright red, not the picture shown. Definitely size down. Medium fits like an XL. The front is shorter than the back. Perfect for wearing with leggings. I buy these every year, in multiple colors! This sweater runs VERY large. I usually wear XL but Medium is the perfect fit. The collar is very big and makes a classy statement. So warm and cozy! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: High quality shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a perfect find! I bought it in three colors after downsizing to the small.
items.body: Ooommgg!!!! Absolutely love this! The quality is high-end, it’s so soft and cozy. Sleeves hug your arms in a comfortable cozy way. Medium thickness, very durable. It is versatile enough to wear with jeans, dress slacks, or even leggings around the house. Generous length. I don’t wanna take it off.. one thing to know it runs really big. I am a size 8 typically and the medium was very very large. So I returned it and got the small and it fits absolutely perfect! I am 5’6 148 pounds. Read more
items.author: Kathi Horn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color not as pictured
items.body: I had two of these sweaters already and ordered a third one in the "blue" color. The blue does not look like the picture in the listing. It is more of a gray-blue, which is not flattering on me. The one pictured is more vivid. I will be returning this. I'm not sure if I will order one in another colo at this time. Otherwise, I do like the style and quality of the sweater. As most of the reviews stated, you should size down. I normally wear a Large, but the Medium fits me better. Read more
items.author: zabbie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite sweater, consider another version of same style
items.body: This is my favorite sweater of late! Please consider making this exact same sweater with same fabric content and design; just without the large turtleneck, for those of us with mobility issues. I’d buy it in every color if you had a boatneck shaped neck option (that would be just amazing), or even just a good sized crew neck that is not too tight at neck opening. I love how this fabric feels softer and has a more cotton texture blend that fits well’s, retains shape and holds up well in the wash do two years now. Some of your other sweaters are similar but have a more synthetic cheaper feel where this one feels like a good quality material, just the right warmth for most of the fall and winter season and has held up much better than the other blends in other styles. This sweater is much more flattering in how it hangs on one’s body, making it easy for everyday or dressier occasions compared with other similar styles by this brand. The shape is great, again just wish it came in an option without the huge turtleneck as that limits when I can wear this and whether it hurts my neck. Read more
items.author: E Bosio

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order up to look like the pic
items.body: The sky blue color is a beautiful turquoise. The fabric is soft and not scratchy and has good amount of stretch. Size up 2 sizes to get the loose look in the picture. I ordered my normal size according to the size chart and it was tight around the neck and sleeves and much shorter, so I returned it. I would have ordered a larger size, but the price jumped over $15. :-( Update: I did order the larger size. The sleeves and neck are still tighter than shown in the picture. The turtleneck is excessively long, and it does not lay nicely like in the picture when folded down once, because it's tight. I have to fold it twice and then it fits like a snug turtleneck, not loose like pictured. The back is a lot longer than the front, but I don't hate that. I'm keeping it because it's soft and stretchy and I love the color. Read more
items.author: AgainBooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Wonderfully soft and terrific fit! Great value and quality with perfect length and style. Read more
items.author: E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
items.body: I absolutely ADORE this turtleneck! It is true to size, well made, and covers just enough of my backside. I can layer it over thermals/other shirts for more warmth on really cold days, and it still fits great under my puffy vest - so perfect for layering or to wear alone. I have received numerous compliments on this top, and I love that I can dress it down with my jeans or camo pants/skort as well as I can dress it up with work skirts and tights or with my black pants. It is very versatile, and I plan to get more colors. Read more
items.author: bikerchic29841

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky, Brown, Deep Green, Parchment Apricot, Rose, Orange Rust, Black, Camel, Ginger, Grass, Lake, Dark Gray, Teal, Peach Brown Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
